title: My ward skins are almost all gone
body: Recently, after I bought the recon drone ward, almost all of my ward skins have disappeared and its very strange. I had the season three championship skin, and some others that I don't remember what they were specifically. can someone please help me. I found this when I wanted to change to my drone ward skin to my season 3 championship. I would really appreciate the help.

replies.body:
We're aware of an issue that prevents some ward skins from displaying in either champ select or in the Summoner Profile. This is purely a visual issue, and the wards still exist on your account. 

I don't have a timeline on when a fix for this will roll out, but please let me know if you have any other questions.
It happened to me i was opening some Augmented Chaches and i got a Ward Skin Shard i use some essence to make them permanent and they arent showing in champ selects
I have the same issue although I never bought the recon ward skin. It just happened to me after patching to 6.16.

Same, somewhere between the time I purchased and selected the Recon Drone Ward skin and Kled was unlocked for play a lot of older ward skins disappeared from the UI; **As of 8/14/2016 something is wrong with some ward skins' ownership in the client.**

Best guess is that some of the older ward skins like the Halloween and Championship ones that aren't purchasable in the store are currently flagged in such a way that they can't be selected for use either, regardless of ownership.

_I'm sure it'll be fixed, but chime in here if you're affected and maybe it'll get attention sooner rather than later!_
